Package pkg2048

Package for making the 2048 game, including all the primary functions (game movements, displaying score, best score, clock, UI like main menu, statistics, buttons,...), except the functions of saving information, which is dependant on the DataSaving package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Clock
    Class to create a hh:mm:ss format clock and display in a JLabel
    Coordinate
    Store a coordinate (in a 2-dimensional panel)
    DrawingPanel
    Class to draw the state of games (positions and data values of tiles)
    Game
    Panel to display game and for user to play game
    MapCoordinates
    Coordinates of tile map for drawing
    Menu
    Main menu of 2048 game
    Position
    Class to store position of a tile in
    StatDisplay
    Form to display statistics of 2048 game.
    Tile
    Class that represents a single tile in the TileMap
    TileMap
    Class for storing Tiles
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TileMap.Movement
    Supported types of movement

Package pkg2048 Description

Package for making the 2048 game, including all the primary functions (game movements, displaying score, best score, clock, UI like main menu, statistics, buttons,...), except the functions of saving information, which is dependant on the DataSaving package.
